name: Joy and Me
storyline:
JOY AND ME tells stories from different points of view, each victim of the diabolical dolls, showing their origin, nightmares and all the evil that is to come, each victim when dying is reincarnated into a new wooden doll.

A girl and her mother are murdered. for his father, but one day the father has a big fight with his mother and the terror of the moment surrounds you, but apparently you are not alone.

Miksi, a doll that comes from outside your room tries to calm you down, but at the same time something strange happens, for some strange reason it doesn't want you to leave the room.
summary: Joy and me is a horror video game saga with events based on real events. Each chapter of the saga has things based on real events, both personal and paranormal problems, this saga has been developing for 7 years, and is practically almost ready for its premiere.
